name: Berd Breaker
description:
Bird Breaker is a game about ice fishing as an arctic seagull with a powerful beak and thermal-like vision.  Smash holes through the thin parts of the ice sheet to grab fish in the lake and resurface before you freeze to death.

Credits:

Lead Programmer: Thomas Horne

Secondary Programmer: Justin Koops

Lead Artist: Lee Ikonomopoulos

Secondary Artist: Khang Doan

Music: Libby Feldmann

Concept and Design: Justin Newell

Sound Effects from ZapSplat.com
